column4: on xubuntu 8.04, i have to install wireless dlink g132 for internet...i have downloaded ndiswrappers, installed,but when i install neta5agu driver: sudo ndiswrapper -i /Desktop/Driver/netA5AGU.inf
couldn't open /desktop/driver/netA5AGU.inf: no such file or directory at /usr/sbin/ndiswrapper-1.9 line 181.
Sounds like the driver files are not in the place that ndiswrapper is expecting them to be.
